name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in **Software Development**, delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **Python**, and experienced with **Go**, leveraging skills in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept in AI applications, having built platforms that support predictive analytics and real-time processing.

Demonstrated expertise in code analysis and documentation practices, ensuring code quality and maintainability. Experienced in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. Strong advocate for CI/CD practices. Knowledgeable in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with **HIPAA**, **FHIR**, **PCI DSS**, and **SOC 2** standards. Well-rounded background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

• Implemented machine learning solutions for fraud detection and risk scoring using **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, seamlessly integrating predictive models into live systems, reducing fraud incidents by **20%**.
• Established MLOps practices via **MLflow** and **Airflow**, streamlining the model training and deployment pipeline across **3** different environments, ensuring consistent performance.
• Developed intuitive dashboards and intelligent features powered by models from **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**, enhancing decision-making processes in financial operations.
• Built robust DevOps and continuous integration pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, incorporating full test automation and security checks that reduced vulnerabilities by **15%**.
• Created advanced data visualizations with **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling end-users to analyze real-time financial activities and key performance indicators effectively.
• Collaborated with data science teams on deploying NLP models using **spaCy** for document parsing, ensuring secure REST API integrations for various applications.
• Defined and enforced rigorous testing strategies across the development cycle using **Jest** and **Cypress**, ensuring code quality and adherence to documentation standards while achieving **95%** test coverage.
• Integrated search functionality utilizing **Azure Cognitive Search** and **Elasticsearch**, enhancing query performance and flexibility across diverse datasets and improving user experience.

• Developed and maintained high-performance applications using **JavaScript** with frameworks such as React (18), Vue 3, and Next.js, ensuring efficient user engagement in financial services.
• Implemented robust backend solutions with **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Go**, leveraging microservices architecture to enhance scalability for systems handling over **100,000** transactions daily.
• Produced quality documentation and conducted code analysis to maintain best practices in software development, improving overall team productivity by **30%**.
• Engaged in effective communication with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver software solutions, enhancing collaboration across departments.
• Designed data pipelines for ETL processes, utilizing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, leading to a **50%** improvement in data processing speed from third-party sources.
• Developed machine learning models for AI-driven fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, improving fraud detection rates by **25%** based on historical user transaction patterns.
• Spearheaded the creation of machine learning pipelines for real-time credit scoring and transaction classifications, integrating successfully with model inference into backend services through **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
• Contributed to the migration of legacy systems to modern cloud-based architectures, enhancing system reliability and maintenance through agile practices.

Utilized **JavaScript** frameworks for developing dynamic e-commerce applications, enhancing user experience through optimized UI interactions.
